get.description: Endpoint básico de teste
Verifica o status da aplicação e conexão com Supabase

post.description: Registra um novo usuário com email e senha

403.description: Rate limit excedido. Aguarde antes de tentar novamente

post.description: Autentica um usuário usando email e senha

403.description: Rate limit excedido. Aguarde antes de tentar novamente

get.description: Redireciona para a página de autorização do provedor OAuth (Google, GitHub, Facebook, Apple)

200.description: URL de autorização (quando não há redirecionamento)

302.description: Redirecionamento para página de autorização OAuth

get.description: Processa o callback do provedor OAuth após autorização do usuário

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Código de autorização retornado pelo provedor OAuth

post.description: Envia um link mágico por email para autenticação sem senha

403.description: Rate limit excedido. Aguarde antes de tentar novamente

post.description: Verifica o token do magic link e autentica o usuário
Se o código não for fornecido, envia OTP por SMS. Se fornecido, verifica e autentica

200.description: OTP enviado ou verificado com sucesso

403.description: Rate limit excedido. Aguarde antes de tentar novamente

post.description: Verifica o código OTP recebido por SMS e autentica o usuário
Renova o access token usando o refresh token

get.description: Retorna os dados do usuário autenticado

post.description: Encerra a sessão do usuário autenticado
Altera a senha do usuário autenticado

401.description: Senha atual incorreta ou não autenticado

403.description: Rate limit excedido. Aguarde antes de tentar novamente

post.description: Creates a new person with the provided information. The photo can be uploaded separately using the photo upload endpoint.

409.description: Conflict - Person with this email or CPF already exists

get.description: Retrieves a list of all persons with pagination support
Retrieves a specific person by their ID

404.description: Person not found
Person not found

delete.description: Deletes a person by their ID

404.description: Person not found

post.description: Uploads or updates a photo for a specific person. Accepts image files (JPG, PNG, GIF) with a maximum size of 5MB.

photo.description: Image file (JPG, PNG, GIF). Maximum size: 5MB

400.description: Invalid file format or size exceeds 5MB

404.description: Person not found

413.description: Payload too large - File size exceeds 5MB

delete.description: Removes the photo from a specific person

404.description: Person not found or photo does not exist

post.description: Creates a new scheduled absence for a person

404.description: Person or absence type not found

409.description: Conflict - Overlapping absence dates for the same person

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of scheduled absences with optional filters

parameters.name: personName
parameters.description: Filter by person name (partial match, case-insensitive)

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Filter by start date (ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DD). Returns absences starting from this date

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Filter by end date (ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DD). Returns absences ending before or on this date

parameters.name: dateRange
parameters.description: Filter by date range. Returns absences that overlap with the specified date range. Format: YYYY-MM-DD,YYYY-MM-DD

200.description: List of scheduled absences retrieved successfully

get.description: Retrieves a specific scheduled absence by its ID

404.description: Scheduled absence not found
Scheduled absence, person, or absence type not found

409.description: Conflict - Overlapping absence dates for the same person

delete.description: Deletes a scheduled absence by its ID

404.description: Scheduled absence not found

post.description: Creates a new absence type (e.g., Férias, Feriado, Licença)

409.description: Conflict - Absence type with this name already exists

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of absence types with optional filters

200.description: List of absence types retrieved successfully

get.description: Retrieves a specific absence type by its ID

404.description: Absence type not found
Absence type not found

409.description: Conflict - Absence type with this name already exists

delete.description: Deletes an absence type by its ID. Cannot delete if there are scheduled absences using this type.

404.description: Absence type not found

409.description: Conflict - Cannot delete absence type that is being used by scheduled absences

patch.description: Toggles the active status of an absence type

404.description: Absence type not found

post.description: Creates a new scheduled area with the provided information. The image can be uploaded separately using the image upload endpoint.

404.description: Responsible person not found

get.description: Retrieves a list of all scheduled areas with pagination support. Can be filtered by favorite status.

200.description: List of scheduled areas retrieved successfully

get.description: Retrieves a specific scheduled area by its ID

404.description: Scheduled area not found

patch.description: Updates a scheduled area with the provided information. Only provided fields will be updated.

404.description: Scheduled area not found or responsible person not found

delete.description: Deletes a scheduled area by its ID

404.description: Scheduled area not found

post.description: Uploads or updates an image for a specific scheduled area. Accepts image files (JPG, PNG, GIF) with a maximum size of 5MB.

image.description: Image file (JPG, PNG, GIF). Maximum size: 5MB

400.description: Invalid file format or size exceeds 5MB

404.description: Scheduled area not found

413.description: Payload too large - File size exceeds 5MB

delete.description: Removes the image from a specific scheduled area

404.description: Scheduled area not found or image does not exist

patch.description: Toggles the favorite status of a scheduled area

404.description: Scheduled area not found

post.description: Creates a new responsibility with the provided information. Must be linked to a scheduled area.

404.description: Scheduled area not found

get.description: Retrieves a list of all responsibilities with pagination support. Can be filtered by scheduled area ID.
Retrieves a specific responsibility by its ID

404.description: Responsibility not found

patch.description: Updates a responsibility with the provided information. Only provided fields will be updated.

404.description: Responsibility not found or scheduled area not found

delete.description: Deletes a responsibility by its ID

404.description: Responsibility not found

post.description: Uploads or updates an image for a specific responsibility. Accepts image files (JPG, PNG, GIF) with a maximum size of 5MB.

image.description: Image file (JPG, PNG, GIF). Maximum size: 5MB

400.description: Invalid file format or size exceeds 5MB

404.description: Responsibility not found

413.description: Payload too large - File size exceeds 5MB

delete.description: Removes the image from a specific responsibility

404.description: Responsibility not found or image does not exist

post.description: Associates a person with a scheduled area and assigns one or more responsibilities to them.

201.description: Person added to scheduled area successfully

400.description: Invalid input data (person not found, responsibility not found, or responsibility does not belong to the area)

404.description: Scheduled area not found

409.description: Conflict - Person is already associated with this scheduled area

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all persons associated with a scheduled area, including their assigned responsibilities.

parameters.name: personName
parameters.description: Filter by person name (partial match, case-insensitive)

parameters.name: personEmail
parameters.description: Filter by person email (partial match, case-insensitive)

parameters.name: responsibilityId
parameters.description: Filter by responsibility ID (show only persons with this responsibility)

200.description: List of persons in scheduled area retrieved successfully

404.description: Scheduled area not found

get.description: Retrieves the person-area association for a specific person in a scheduled area. This is useful when you know the person ID but not the association ID.

404.description: Person not associated with this scheduled area, or scheduled area not found

get.summary: Get person area by person ID

get.description: Retrieves a specific person-area association by its ID.

404.description: Person area association or scheduled area not found

get.summary: Get person area association by ID

patch.description: Updates the responsibilities assigned to a person in a scheduled area. Only the responsibilities list will be updated.

400.description: Invalid input data (responsibility not found or does not belong to the area)

404.description: Person area association or scheduled area not found

delete.description: Removes a person from a scheduled area, including all their assigned responsibilities.

204.description: Person removed from scheduled area successfully

404.description: Person area association or scheduled area not found

post.description: Creates a new group within a scheduled area.

404.description: Scheduled area not found

409.description: Conflict - Group with this name already exists in the scheduled area

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all groups within a scheduled area, including their members and member responsibilities.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter by group name (partial match, case-insensitive)

404.description: Scheduled area not found

get.description: Retrieves a specific group by its ID, including all members and their responsibilities.

404.description: Group or scheduled area not found

patch.description: Updates a group's name and description. Only provided fields will be updated.

404.description: Group or scheduled area not found

409.description: Conflict - Group with this name already exists in the scheduled area

delete.description: Removes a group and all its member associations. This operation cannot be undone.

404.description: Group or scheduled area not found

post.description: Adds a person to a group within a scheduled area. The person must already be associated with the scheduled area (via Person Area API).

400.description: Invalid input data (person not found, person not in scheduled area, responsibility not found, or responsibility does not belong to the area)

404.description: Group or scheduled area not found

409.description: Conflict - Person is already a member of this group

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all members in a group, including their responsibilities.

parameters.name: personName
parameters.description: Filter by person name (partial match, case-insensitive)

parameters.name: personEmail
parameters.description: Filter by person email (partial match, case-insensitive)

parameters.name: responsibilityId
parameters.description: Filter by responsibility ID (show only members with this responsibility)

200.description: List of group members retrieved successfully

404.description: Group or scheduled area not found

get.description: Retrieves the group member association for a specific person in a group. This is useful when you know the person ID but not the member ID.

404.description: Person not a member of this group, or group/scheduled area not found

get.summary: Get group member by person ID

get.description: Retrieves a specific group member by their member ID.

404.description: Group member, group, or scheduled area not found

patch.description: Updates the responsibilities assigned to a member within a group. The entire responsibilities list is replaced with the provided list.

400.description: Invalid input data (responsibility not found or does not belong to the area)

404.description: Group member, group, or scheduled area not found

delete.description: Removes a person from a group, including all their responsibility assignments within that group.

404.description: Group member, group, or scheduled area not found

post.description: Creates a new team within a scheduled area. Teams can have multiple roles (funções) with quantities, priorities, and fixed person assignments.

404.description: Scheduled area not found

409.description: Conflict - Team with this name already exists in the scheduled area

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all teams within a scheduled area, including their roles.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter by team name (partial match, case-insensitive)

404.description: Scheduled area not found

get.description: Retrieves a specific team by its ID, including all roles and fixed person assignments.

404.description: Team or scheduled area not found

patch.description: Updates a team's name, description, and/or roles. Only provided fields will be updated. When updating roles, the entire roles array is replaced.

400.description: Invalid input data (e.g., duplicate priority, invalid quantity, fixed persons exceed quantity)

404.description: Team or scheduled area not found

409.description: Conflict - Team with this name already exists in the scheduled area, or duplicate priority in roles

delete.description: Removes a team and all its roles. This operation cannot be undone.

404.description: Team or scheduled area not found

post.description: Generates a preview of schedules that will be created based on the provided configuration. This endpoint does not create schedules, only returns a preview for validation.

404.description: Scheduled area not found

post.description: Confirms the generation configuration and creates all schedules. This endpoint creates a schedule generation record and multiple schedule records based on the configuration.

404.description: Scheduled area, groups, teams, or persons not found

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all schedule generations for a scheduled area.

200.description: List of schedule generations retrieved successfully

404.description: Scheduled area not found

get.description: Retrieves a specific schedule generation with all its associated schedules.

404.description: Schedule generation or scheduled area not found

delete.description: Deletes a schedule generation and all schedules associated with it. This action cannot be undone.

204.description: Schedule generation and all schedules deleted successfully

404.description: Schedule generation or scheduled area not found

delete.summary: Delete schedule generation and all its schedules

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of schedules for a scheduled area. Supports filtering by schedule generation, date range, person, group, team, and status.

parameters.name: personId
parameters.description: Filter by person ID (schedules where this person participates)

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Filter by group ID (schedules with this group)

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: Filter by team ID (schedules with this team)

404.description: Scheduled area not found

post.description: Creates a manual schedule (not generated automatically).

404.description: Scheduled area, groups, teams, or persons not found

get.description: Retrieves a specific schedule with all its details including members, assignments, and comments.

404.description: Schedule or scheduled area not found

patch.description: Updates a schedule. Can update startDatetime, endDatetime, and status for any schedule.

404.description: Schedule or scheduled area not found

delete.description: Deletes a schedule. Only manual schedules can be deleted. Automatically generated schedules should be deleted through their schedule generation.

404.description: Schedule or scheduled area not found

post.description: Adds a person to a schedule with a specific responsibility.

400.description: Invalid input data or person already in schedule

404.description: Schedule, person, or responsibility not found

get.description: Retrieves all logs for a specific schedule.

404.description: Schedule or scheduled area not found

patch.description: Updates a schedule member's responsibility or status.

404.description: Schedule member, schedule, or scheduled area not found

delete.description: Removes a person from a schedule.

404.description: Schedule member, schedule, or scheduled area not found

post.description: Adds a comment to a schedule.

404.description: Schedule or scheduled area not found

patch.description: Updates a comment on a schedule. Only the comment author can update their comment.

400.description: Invalid input data or unauthorized to update

404.description: Comment, schedule, or scheduled area not found

delete.description: Deletes a comment from a schedule. Only the comment author or administrators can delete comments.

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to delete this comment

404.description: Comment, schedule, or scheduled area not found

info.title: Authentication API
info.description: API de autenticação escalável com suporte a múltiplos métodos (Email/Senha, OAuth, Magic Link, OTP)

tags.name: scheduled-absences
tags.description: Endpoints de gerenciamento de ausências agendadas

tags.name: absence-types
tags.description: Endpoints de gerenciamento de tipos de ausência

tags.name: scheduled-areas
tags.description: Endpoints de gerenciamento de áreas de escala

emailVerified.description: Indica se o email foi verificado

phoneVerified.description: Indica se o telefone foi verificado

session.description: Dados da sessão (apenas quando há sessão ativa)

accessToken.description: Access token JWT (apenas quando há sessão)

redirectTo.description: URL de redirecionamento após clicar no magic link

email.description: Email para onde o link foi enviado

token.description: Token do magic link recebido por email

code.description: Código OTP recebido por SMS (opcional, se não fornecido, será enviado)

refreshToken.description: Refresh token para renovar a sessão

phone.description: Mobile phone number (10-11 digits, without formatting)

cpf.description: CPF number (11 digits, without formatting, must be unique)

birthDate.description: Date of birth in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD)

emergencyContact.description: Emergency contact phone number (10-11 digits, without formatting)

address.description: Full address including street, number, complement, neighborhood, city, state, and ZIP code
address.example: Rua das Flores, 123, Apto 45, Centro, São Paulo - SP, 01234-567
Rua das Flores, 123, Apto 45, Centro, São Paulo - SP, 01234-567

photoUrl.description: URL to the person's photo (null if no photo uploaded)

email.description: Email address (must be unique if changed)

phone.description: Mobile phone number (10-11 digits, without formatting)

cpf.description: CPF number (11 digits, without formatting, must be unique if changed)

birthDate.description: Date of birth in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD)

emergencyContact.description: Emergency contact phone number (10-11 digits, without formatting)

address.example: Rua das Flores, 123, Apto 45, Centro, São Paulo - SP, 01234-567

personId.description: ID of the person who will be absent

absenceTypeId.description: ID of the absence type (e.g., Férias, Feriado, Licença)

startDate.description: Start date of the absence in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD)

endDate.description: End date of the absence in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD). Must be greater than or equal to startDate

description.description: Optional description or notes about the absence
Description or notes about the absence

personId.description: ID of the person who will be absent

startDate.description: Start date of the absence in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD)

endDate.description: End date of the absence in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD). Must be greater than or equal to startDate

description.description: Optional description or notes about the absence

name.description: Name of the absence type (e.g., Férias, Feriado, Licença)

description.description: Optional description of the absence type

color.description: Hex color code for UI display (format: #RRGGBB)

active.description: Whether the absence type is active and can be used

color.description: Hex color code for UI display

active.description: Whether the absence type is active and can be used

color.description: Hex color code for UI display (format: #RRGGBB)

active.description: Whether the absence type is active and can be used

responsiblePersonId.description: ID of the responsible person (must exist)

favorite.description: Whether the area is marked as favorite

photoUrl.description: URL to the responsible person photo

imageUrl.description: URL to the scheduled area image (null if no image uploaded)

favorite.description: Whether the area is marked as favorite

responsiblePersonId.description: ID of the responsible person (must exist)

favorite.description: Whether the area is marked as favorite
Favorite status (true to add to favorites, false to remove)

description.example: Responsável por gerenciar a produção diária

scheduledAreaId.description: ID of the scheduled area (must exist)

description.example: Responsável por gerenciar a produção diária

imageUrl.description: URL to the responsibility image (null if no image)

description.example: Responsável por gerenciar a produção diária

scheduledAreaId.description: ID of the scheduled area (must exist)

personId.description: ID of the person to associate with the area

responsibilityIds.description: Array of responsibility IDs (must belong to the scheduled area, can be empty)

id.description: Unique identifier for the person-area association

responsibilities.description: Array of responsibilities assigned to the person in this area

responsibilityIds.description: Array of responsibility IDs (must belong to the scheduled area, can be empty)

id.description: Unique identifier for the group member association

responsibilities.description: Array of responsibilities assigned to the person in this group

scheduledAreaId.description: ID of the scheduled area this group belongs to

membersCount.description: Number of members in the group

members.description: Array of group members (populated when requested)

personId.description: ID of the person to add to the group (must be associated with the scheduled area)

responsibilityIds.description: Array of responsibility IDs (must belong to the scheduled area, can be empty)
Array of responsibility IDs (must belong to the scheduled area, can be empty)

responsibilityId.description: ID of the responsibility (função) - must belong to the scheduled area

quantity.description: Number of people needed for this role

priority.description: Priority of this role (lower number = higher priority). Must be unique within the team.

isFree.description: If true, the role is free to be assigned to any person. If false, specific fixed persons must be assigned.

fixedPersonIds.description: Array of person IDs assigned as fixed to this role. Required if isFree is false. All persons must be associated with the scheduled area. The number of fixed persons cannot exceed the quantity.

scheduledAreaId.description: ID of the scheduled area this team belongs to

roles.description: Array of roles (funções) for the team (optional, can be added later)

id.description: Unique identifier for the team role

responsibilityName.description: Name of the responsibility (função) - populated by the server

quantity.description: Number of people needed for this role

priority.description: Priority of this role (lower number = higher priority)

isFree.description: If true, the role is free to be assigned to any person. If false, specific fixed persons are assigned.

fixedPersonIds.description: Array of person IDs assigned as fixed to this role (empty if isFree is true)

scheduledAreaId.description: ID of the scheduled area this team belongs to

roles.description: Array of roles (funções) in the team

id.description: ID of the role (required when updating existing role, omit when adding new role)

responsibilityId.description: ID of the responsibility (função) - must belong to the scheduled area

quantity.description: Number of people needed for this role

priority.description: Priority of this role (lower number = higher priority). Must be unique within the team (excluding the role being updated).

isFree.description: If true, the role is free to be assigned to any person. If false, specific fixed persons must be assigned.

fixedPersonIds.description: Array of person IDs assigned as fixed to this role. Required if isFree is false. All persons must be associated with the scheduled area. The number of fixed persons cannot exceed the quantity.

roles.description: Array of roles (funções) for the team. When provided, the entire roles array is replaced.

groupIds.description: Array of group IDs to use in generation (min 1)

groupsPerSchedule.description: Number of groups to assign per schedule (min 1)

distributionOrder.description: Distribution order: 'sequential' (fixed order), 'random' (random order), 'balanced' (balanced distribution avoiding repetitions)

considerAbsences.description: Whether to consider absences when selecting groups (groups with absent members will be excluded)

excludedPersonIds.description: Array of person IDs to exclude from groups (even if they are group members)

considerAbsences.description: Whether to consider absences when selecting people

excludedPersonIds.description: Array of person IDs to exclude (all other people in the area are included by default)

teamId.description: Team ID to use in generation

participantSelection.description: Participant selection mode: 'all' (all people in area), 'by_group' (filter by groups), 'individual' (manual selection), 'all_with_exclusions' (all except excluded)

selectedGroupIds.description: Array of group IDs (required when participantSelection is "by_group")

selectedPersonIds.description: Array of person IDs (required when participantSelection is "individual")

excludedPersonIds.description: Array of person IDs to exclude (used when participantSelection is "all_with_exclusions")

considerAbsences.description: Whether to consider absences when selecting people

requireResponsibilities.description: Whether to require responsibilities (only people with matching responsibilities can be assigned to roles)

repeatPersonsWhenInsufficient.description: When enabled, if there are not enough people to fill all roles, available people will be repeated to fill remaining slots

baseDateTime.description: Base date/time for the first schedule (used for fixed, weekly, monthly, daily)

duration.description: Duration of each schedule in days (for weekly, monthly) or hours (for fixed)

interval.description: Interval between schedules in days (for weekly period type, default: 7)

weekdays.description: Days of the week (0=Sunday, 1=Monday, ..., 6=Saturday) for daily period type

startTime.description: Start time in HH:mm format (for daily period type)

endTime.description: End time in HH:mm format (for daily period type)

excludedDates.description: Array of dates to exclude from generation (useful for holidays)

includedDates.description: Array of specific dates to include even if they don't match the pattern (useful for special days)

scheduledAreaId.description: Scheduled area where schedules will be generated

generationType.description: Type of generation: 'group' (by groups), 'people' (by people), 'team_without_restriction' (team without responsibility validation), 'team_with_restriction' (team with responsibility validation)

periodType.description: Type of period: 'fixed' (single schedule), 'monthly' (repeats monthly), 'weekly' (repeats weekly), 'daily' (repeats daily with restrictions)

periodStartDate.description: Start date of the generation period

periodEndDate.description: End date of the generation period

groupConfig.description: Group generation configuration (required when generationType is "group")

peopleConfig.description: People generation configuration (required when generationType is "people")

teamConfig.description: Team generation configuration (required when generationType is "team_without_restriction" or "team_with_restriction")

members.description: Members of the group (populated when requested)

personId.description: Person ID (empty string if not assigned)

personName.description: Person name ('[Não atribuído]' if not assigned)

id.description: Temporary ID for preview (not a real schedule ID)

groups.description: Groups assigned to this schedule (for group generation type)

team.description: Team assigned to this schedule (for team generation types)

warnings.description: Array of warning messages (e.g., consecutive repetitions, unbalanced distribution)

errors.description: Array of error messages (e.g., absent people, missing responsibilities, unassigned roles)

totalSchedules.description: Total number of schedules that will be created

totalParticipants.description: Total number of unique participants across all schedules

distributionBalance.description: Distribution balance status: 'balanced' (good distribution), 'unbalanced' (some issues), 'critical' (many issues)

schedules.description: Array of preview schedules that will be created

periodStartDate.description: Start date of the generation period

periodEndDate.description: End date of the generation period

configuration.description: Full configuration used for generation (JSON object)

createdBy.description: ID of the person who created the generation

schedules.description: Created schedules with full details (including group members)

scheduleGenerationId.description: ID of the schedule generation (null for manual schedules)

participantsCount.description: Number of participants in the schedule

participants.description: List of participants with id, name and imageUrl

logs.description: Logs of changes to schedule and members

scheduleType.description: Type of schedule: 'group' (assigned to groups), 'team' (assigned to team with roles), 'individual' (assigned to individual people)

groupIds.description: Array of group IDs (required when scheduleType is "group")

assignments.description: Array of person-role assignments (required when scheduleType is "team")

memberIds.description: Array of person IDs (required when scheduleType is "individual")

scheduleGenerationId.description: ID of the schedule generation (null for manual schedules)

participantsCount.description: Number of participants in the schedule

participants.description: List of participants with id, name and imageUrl

logs.description: Logs of changes to schedule and members

personId.description: Person ID to add to the schedule
